name: Prototype Rancour
description: An ancient longsword discovered in the Blackcliff Forge that cuts through rocks like a hot knife through butter.

passiveDescription.0: On hit, Normal or Charged Attacks increase ATK and DEF by <cryo>4%</cryo> for 6s. Max 4 stacks. This effect can only occur once every 0.3s.
passiveDescription.1: On hit, Normal or Charged Attacks increase ATK and DEF by <cryo>5%</cryo> for 6s. Max 4 stacks. This effect can only occur once every 0.3s.
passiveDescription.2: On hit, Normal or Charged Attacks increase ATK and DEF by <cryo>6%</cryo> for 6s. Max 4 stacks. This effect can only occur once every 0.3s.
passiveDescription.3: On hit, Normal or Charged Attacks increase ATK and DEF by <cryo>7%</cryo> for 6s. Max 4 stacks. This effect can only occur once every 0.3s.
passiveDescription.4: On hit, Normal or Charged Attacks increase ATK and DEF by <cryo>8%</cryo> for 6s. Max 4 stacks. This effect can only occur once every 0.3s.
